dcterms:creator: Lars Onsager
dcterms:description: The dataset contains the spin distribution of the 2D lattice Ising model with 16 × 16 interacting spins, simulated using Metropolis Monte Carlo. It is reflectional and rotational symmetric by construction, aiming to classify the ordered phase from the disordered phase.
dcterms:title: Ising model dataset

dcterms:creator: Tak Hur
Leeseok Kim
Daniel K. Park
dcterms:description: The extended MNIST dataset includes randomly reflected and rotated handwritten digit images, specifically for the classification of digits 4 and 5, downsampled into 16 × 16 pixels.
dcterms:title: Extended MNIST dataset
